metadata.title: CVE-2018-13844 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue has been found in HTSlib 1.8. It is a memory leakin fai_read in faidx.c. NOTE: This has been disputed with the assertionthat this vulnerability exists in the test harness and HTSlib users wouldbe aware of the need to destruct this object returned by fai_load() intheir own code.

criterions.comment: htslib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
